Package evoter.server.http.request.interfaces

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IAccountService
    Define methods to handle requests involving user account
    IAnswerService
    This is an interface to define methods that works with Answer object in the database
    There is no delete function for answer just because the relation between Question and Answer is UPDATE CASCASDE AND DELETE CASCADE, so when question is deleted, its answers are deleted by default
    IQuestionService
    Interface define all methods to handle requests involving Question
    ISessionService  
    ISubjectService
    Define methods to handle the coming requests involving Subject
    IUserService
    Define methods to handle the coming request involving User
